timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            When deployment is enabled, the Kubernetes extension will selected the resources specified by `quarkus.kubernetes.deployment.target` and deploy them.
          
          
            
            When deployment is enabled, the Kubernetes extension will select the resources specified by `quarkus.kubernetes.deployment.target` and deploy them.
timeline.author: geoand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -728,8 +728,8 @@ Each time deployment is requested, a container image build will be implicitly tr
 
 === Deploying
 
-When deployment is enabled, the kubernetes extension will selected the resources specified by `quarkus.kubernetes.deployment.target` and deploy them.
-This assumes that a `.kube/config` is available in your user directory that points to the target kubernetes cluster.
+When deployment is enabled, the Kubernetes extension will selected the resources specified by `quarkus.kubernetes.deployment.target` and deploy them.

replies.bodyText: Not a fault of this PR of course, but while you are at it, let's fix this typo :)
replies.author: geoand
